vendor_name: Hyde Bodrum - Adults Only All Inclusive
title: Glamorous Adults-Only Bodrum Beachfront Indulgence with All-Inclusive Dining & Free-Flow Drinks
description:
Delve into a world of sun-soaked bliss at this adults-only hedonistic haven perched on the shores of the sparkling Aegean Sea in the Bodrum Peninsula. Stylish to behold, the five-star property features bohemian-chic rooms and curates a carnivalesque experience with live music and DJs to keep you entertained.

Relish the perks of a truly all-inclusive resort by dining across the hotel's five bars and restaurants, including French Riviera-style dining at La Rebelle, sipping on seductive cocktails at Bungalow and jiving to the high-energy and eclectic music at Hyde Beach Club.

Spend your days swimming in the glimmering outdoor pool, dip your toes in the golden sands of the resort's private beach, and find balance with a chakra healing session. If you wish to explore, the historic Bodrum Castle and the ancient Mausoleum at Halicarnassus are nearby. Meanwhile, active travellers can enjoy a day of sailing, diving and fishing in the turquoise waters of the Aegean.
offer_address: Torba District 3117 Street, Nbr:11, 48400 Bodrum, Turkiye

title: Five-Star Bodrum Beachfront Bliss with Infinity Pool, Hamam & Cocktail Bar
description:
Set on the tranquil shores of the Aegean, this refined retreat offers panoramic views over Bodrum’s turquoise bays and pine-clad hills. Wander the ancient streets of Bodrum town, where the Mausoleum at Halicarnassus and the medieval Castle of St Peter await, or browse the boutiques and galleries of the marina district.

Savour Mediterranean cuisine at the elegant rooftop restaurant, where local seafood and Turkish wines take centre stage. The hotel’s spa features hammams and serene treatment rooms, while the infinity pool overlooks the glittering coastline.
location_description: The Bodrum Hotel Yalikavak - MGallery Collection
offer_address: Yalikavak Mahallesi 91, Sokak No 6, Bodrum, Mugla 48990, Turkey

title: Türkiye Five-Star Bodrum Haven Overlooking the Aegean Sea
description: Standing high above sun-bleached cliffs is the five-star Kempinski Hotel Barbaros Bay Bodrum, an ultra-stylish Türkiye escape overlooking the dazzling Aegean Sea. The hotel offers iconic Kempinski luxury in Bodrum and is the perfect base for exploring the town’s many charms just a short drive away. Marvel at the Bodrum Amphitheater, sip arabica coffee at any of the town’s famously shell-pink, vine-hugged cafés or sip cocktails on sweeping golden sands. After a full day of exploration, the hotel’s seven extraordinary restaurants, two bars, world-class 5,550sqm spa or spectacular clifftop infinity pool await, ready to welcome you home.
offer_address: Kızılağaç Mahallesi, Hacıgiden Cd No: 33/1, 48400 Bodrum/Muğla, Turkey

title: Five-Star Bodrum Bliss with 12 World-Class Restaurants & Bars
description: Perched over Paradise Bay and the Aegean Sea is the sparkling Mandarin Oriental, Bodrum, a five-star resort in Turkey's famous resort town. Gourmands can't pass up a stay here with 12 incredible onsite restaurants including an exclusive seaside lounge and bar and Bodrum's most glamorous bar, Mandarin Bar. For a dose of relaxation, head to the two-tier day spa for a decadent spa treatment, luxurious hammams with private scrub rooms and outdoor cabanas with Aegan Sea views.
